title: The Lady’s Dark Secret - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Abusive Characters   Aristocracy   Betrayal   Body Swap   Cunning Protagonist   Dark   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Evil Gods   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Limited Lifespan   Nobles   Personality Changes   Reincarnation   Revenge   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Saints   Second Chance   Tragic Past
author: Yuin   유인
description:
Estelle was the illegitimate child of the Duke who grew up under severe mistreatment. She tried to love the people around her all her life, but she was betrayed and sacrificed to the devil. Thus, she suffered in hell for 600 years.

And then, one day…

'Do you want revenge?'

'If you wish, I will send you back to when you were at your brightest moment.'

The devil’s whisper came. And, Estelle, who took the devil’s hand, returned back from hell. 

A lady of the greatest family of the Empire. 

The Young Lady of Garnet will bring cruel ruins to all those who betrayed her.

“I’ll take everything away from my enemies, and end them in the worst ways possible.”>
